verses.roman:
kṛṣṇa-bhajana kara tumi āmā-duṅhāra saṅge
tina bhāi ekatra rahimu kṛṣṇa-kathā-raṅge"

synonyms: kṛṣṇa-bhajana—devotional service to Lord Kṛṣṇa; kara—engage in; tumi—you; āmā-duṅhāra—the two of us; saṅge—with; tina bhāi—three brothers; ekatra—in one place; rahimu—we shall stay; kṛṣṇa-kathā—of the pastimes of Lord Kṛṣṇa; raṅge—in enjoyment.
translation: " 'Engage yourself in devotional service to Kṛṣṇa with both of us. We three brothers shall stay together and enjoy discussing the pastimes of Lord Kṛṣṇa.'
